txt.en: 'My sons, Déorwine and Gísling, have made me proud. Gísling, my eldest, remains at my side in Garsfeld and aids my people with all of his might. As for Déorwine, he is betrothed to Thane Winsig of Walstow and serves Théoden King at Edoras where, along with his duties, he waits for that wretch Gríma to slip in his deception. Glorious the day will be when that worm's head rests on a pike....'
